subtitle: British home grown rhubarb is delicious with a delicate pink colour. This light fluffy omelette makes an ideal ending to a meal.

method.text: Poach rhubarb in orange juice and caster sugar until tender.
Whisk egg yolks, milk and orange rind until stiff and carefully fold into the mixture.
Heat butter in an omelette pan and pour in souffle mixture. Cook over a low heat until the base has set.
Sprinkle over the rhubarb, brown sugar and yogurt. Cook for 1 min then flip over to enclose filling.
Serve sprinkled with almonds and icing sugar.

title: Rhubarb souffle omelette
